dt: {bc}of, relating to, or arranged in or according to the order of time

dt.t: His art is arranged in {wi}chronological{/wi} order.

et: {it}chonological{/it} from {it}chronologic{/it} + {et_link|-al:1|-al:1} or from {et_link|chronology|chronology} + {et_link|-ical|-ical}; {it}chronologic{/it} from {et_link|chronology|chronology} + {et_link|-ic:1|-ic:1}, probably after French {it}chronologique{/it} or New Latin {it}chronologicus{/it}
shortdef: of, relating to, or arranged in or according to the order of time; also : reckoned in units of time
